DDL.statement: CREATE TABLE `APP_WASTE_LOCATIONS` ( `WASTE_LOCATION_ID` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `DESCRIPTION` varchar(80) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT '', `PROCESS_ORDER_REQUIRED` varchar(1) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT 'N', `REASON_ID_REQUIRED` varchar(1) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT 'N', `ENABLED` varchar(1) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT 'Y', PRIMARY KEY (`WASTE_LOCATION_ID`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;

CREATE TABLE `APP_WASTE_LOG` ( `TRANSACTION_REF` decimal(38,0) NOT NULL, `WASTE_TRANSACTION_TYPE` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `WASTE_LOCATION_ID` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT '', `REPORT_TIME` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `WASTE_MATERIAL_ID` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT '', `PROCESS_ORDER` varchar(10) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT '', `WASTE_REASON_ID` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT '', `USER_ID` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT '', `QUANTITY` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`TRANSACTION_REF`,`WASTE_TRANSACTION_TYPE`) USING BTREE, KEY `LOG_TRANSACTION_TYPE_IDX` (`WASTE_TRANSACTION_TYPE`) USING BTREE, KEY `LOG_LOCATION_ID_IDX` (`WASTE_LOCATION_ID`) USING BTREE, KEY `LOG_MATERIAL_ID_IDX` (`WASTE_MATERIAL_ID`) USING BTREE, KEY `LOG_PROCESS_ORDER_IDX` (`PROCESS_ORDER`) USING BTREE, KEY `LOG_REASON_ID_IDX` (`WASTE_REASON_ID`) USING BTREE, KEY `LOG_REPORT_TIME_IDX` (`REPORT_TIME`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;

CREATE TABLE `APP_WASTE_MATERIAL` ( `WASTE_MATERIAL_ID` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NOT NULL, `WASTE_TYPE_ID` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT '', `UOM` varchar(3) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT '', `COST_PER_UOM` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `CONVERSION_TO_KG` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '1.000', `DESCRIPTION` varchar(80) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT '', `ENABLED` varchar(1) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT 'Y', PRIMARY KEY (`WASTE_MATERIAL_ID`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;

CREATE TABLE `APP_WASTE_REPORTING_IDS` ( `WASTE_REPORTING_ID` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `DESCRIPTION` varchar(80) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT '', `REPORTING_GROUP` int DEFAULT '-1', `ENABLED` varchar(1) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT 'Y', PRIMARY KEY (`WASTE_REPORTING_ID`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;

CREATE TABLE `APP_WASTE_TRANSACTIONS` ( `WASTE_TRANSACTION_TYPE` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `DESCRIPTION` varchar(80) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT '', `INCLUDE_IN_TOTALS` varchar(1) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT 'Y', `STORE_AS_NEGATIVE` varchar(1) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT 'N', `ENABLED` varchar(1) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT 'Y', PRIMARY KEY (`WASTE_TRANSACTION_TYPE`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;

CREATE TABLE `APP_WASTE_TYPES` ( `WASTE_TYPE_ID` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `RECYCLABLE` varchar(1) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT 'Y', `HAZARDOUS` varchar(1) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT 'N', `PPE_REQUIRED` varchar(1) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT 'N', `DESCRIPTION` varchar(80) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT '', `ENABLED` varchar(1) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT 'Y', PRIMARY KEY (`WASTE_TYPE_ID`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;

CREATE VIEW `view_waste_log` AS SELECT `LOG`.`TRANSACTION_REF` AS `TRANSACTION_REF`, `LOG`.`REPORT_TIME` AS `REPORT_TIME`, `LOG`.`WASTE_TRANSACTION_TYPE` AS `WASTE_TRANSACTION_TYPE`, `TRANS`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DESCRIPTION_TRANSACTION`, `LOG`.`WASTE_LOCATION_ID` AS `WASTE_LOCATION_ID`, `LOCN`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DESCRIPTION_LOCATION`, `LOG`.`WASTE_MATERIAL_ID` AS `WASTE_MATERIAL_ID`, `MAT`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DESCRIPTION_MATERIAL`, `MAT`.`WASTE_TYPE_ID` AS `WASTE_TYPE_ID`, `TYP`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DESCRIPTION_TYPE`, `TYP`.`RECYCLABLE` AS `RECYCLABLE`, `TYP`.`HAZARDOUS` AS `HAZARDOUS`, `TYP`.`PPE_REQUIRED` AS `PPE_REQUIRED`, `LOCN`.`REASON_ID_REQUIRED` AS `REASON_ID_REQUIRED`, `LOG`.`WASTE_REASON_ID` AS `WASTE_REASON_ID`, `REAS`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DESCRIPTION_REASON`, `LOCN`.`PROCESS_ORDER_REQUIRED` AS `PROCESS_ORDER_REQUIRED`, `LOG`.`PROCESS_ORDER` AS `PROCESS_ORDER`, `LOG`.`USER_ID` AS `USER_ID`, `LOG`.`QUANTITY` AS `QUANTITY`, `MAT`.`UOM` AS `UOM`, `MAT`.`COST_PER_UOM` AS `COST_PER_UOM`, `MAT`.`CONVERSION_TO_KG` AS `CONVERSION_TO_KG`, (`LOG`.`QUANTITY` * `MAT`.`CONVERSION_TO_KG`) AS `WEIGHT_KG`, (`LOG`.`QUANTITY` * `MAT`.`COST_PER_UOM`) AS `COST`, `TRANS`.`INCLUDE_IN_TOTALS` AS `INCLUDE_IN_TOTALS` FROM APP_WASTE_MATERIAL AS MAT INNER JOIN APP_WASTE_LOG `LOG` ON MAT.WASTE_MATERIAL_ID = `LOG`.WASTE_MATERIAL_ID INNER JOIN APP_WASTE_TYPES TYP ON TYP.WASTE_TYPE_ID = MAT.WASTE_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN APP_WASTE_REASONS REAS ON REAS.WASTE_REASON_ID = `LOG`.WASTE_REASON_ID INNER JOIN APP_WASTE_LOCATIONS LOCN ON LOCN.WASTE_LOCATION_ID = `LOG`.WASTE_LOCATION_ID INNER JOIN APP_WASTE_TRANSACTIONS TRANS ON TRANS.WASTE_TRANSACTION_TYPE = `LOG`.WASTE_TRANSACTION_TYPE

CREATE VIEW `view_waste_reporting` as SELECT `LOG`.`TRANSACTION_REF` AS `TRANSACTION_REF`, `LOG`.`REPORT_TIME` AS `REPORT_TIME`, `LOG`.`WASTE_TRANSACTION_TYPE` AS `WASTE_TRANSACTION_TYPE`, `TRANS`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DESCRIPTION`, `LOG`.`WASTE_LOCATION_ID` AS `WASTE_LOCATION_ID`, `LOCN`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DESCRIPTION_LOCATION`, `LOG`.`WASTE_MATERIAL_ID` AS `WASTE_MATERIAL_ID`, `MAT`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DESCRIPTION_MATERIAL`, `MAT`.`WASTE_TYPE_ID` AS `WASTE_TYPE_ID`, `TYP`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DESCRIPTION_TYPE`, `LOG`.`WASTE_REASON_ID` AS `WASTE_REASON_ID`, `REAS`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DESCRIPTION_REASON`, `LOG`.`PROCESS_ORDER` AS `PROCESS_ORDER`, `LOG`.`USER_ID` AS `USER_ID`, `LOG`.`QUANTITY` AS `QUANTITY`, `MAT`.`UOM` AS `UOM`, `MAT`.`COST_PER_UOM` AS `COST_PER_UOM`, `MAT`.`CONVERSION_TO_KG` AS `CONVERSION_TO_KG`, `REPIDS`.`WASTE_REPORTING_ID` AS `WASTE_REPORTING_ID`, `REPIDS`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `REPORTING_ID_DESCRIPTION`, `REPIDS`.`REPORTING_GROUP` AS `REPORTING_GROUP`, `GRP`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `GROUP_DESCRIPTION` FROM APP_WASTE_MATERIAL AS MAT INNER JOIN APP_WASTE_LOG `LOG` ON MAT.WASTE_MATERIAL_ID = `LOG`.WASTE_MATERIAL_ID INNER JOIN APP_WASTE_TYPES TYP ON TYP.WASTE_TYPE_ID = MAT.WASTE_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN APP_WASTE_REASONS REAS ON REAS.WASTE_REASON_ID = `LOG`.WASTE_REASON_ID INNER JOIN APP_WASTE_LOCATIONS LOCN ON LOCN.WASTE_LOCATION_ID = `LOG`.WASTE_LOCATION_ID INNER JOIN APP_WASTE_LOCATION_REPORTING LOCNREP ON LOCNREP.WASTE_LOCATION_ID = LOG.WASTE_LOCATION_ID INNER JOIN APP_WASTE_REPORTING_IDS REPIDS ON REPIDS.WASTE_REPORTING_ID = LOCNREP.WASTE_REPORTING_ID INNER JOIN APP_WASTE_TRANSACTIONS TRANS ON TRANS.WASTE_TRANSACTION_TYPE = `LOG`.WASTE_TRANSACTION_TYPE INNER JOIN APP_WASTE_REPORTING_GROUP GRP ON GRP.REPORTING_GROUP = REPIDS.REPORTING_GROUP AND ( TRANS.INCLUDE_IN_TOTALS = 'Y' )
